attributes.action: urge Mr. Bush, and any other appropriate official, to close Guantanamo Bay immediately and give all detainees a fair trial
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 11th January it will be five years since Guantanamo Bay opened and in all that time there have been no trials of the detainees.  They have been incarcerated there for HALF A DECADE with no opportunity even to know why they are there let alone defend themselves against whatever they are accused of.  What happened to "innocent until proven guilty"?

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "urge Mr. Bush, and any other appropriate official, to close Guantanamo Bay immediately and give all detainees a fair trial."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12837.asp
